EmailTemplate.name: RateClassNotSupported
EmailTemplate.subject: We're Unable to Move Forward with {!Lead.Name}'s Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Partner_Name__c},
{!Lead.Name}'s rate class isn't supported by the New York's community solar program at this time, meaning we are unable to proceed with their application.
Rate class eligibility is determined by the state and utility providers, so unfortunately this one's out of our hands.
However if {!Lead.Name} has another utility account, we'd be happy to take another look at their eligibility. Please respond here or call our Partner Support team at 888.997.2432 to discuss their eligibility.
- Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.997.2432 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
